import React, { Component } from "react"; import "./App.css"; // 1. CREAR UN TABLA DE PRESUPUESTO ANUAL (BUDGET + 12 MESES CON INCOME, EXPENSES, RESULT) // 2. CAMPOS MODIFICABLES // 3. CAMPOS CALCULADOS AUTOMATICAMENTE // 4. SE GUARDE EN UNA BASE DE DATOS LOS CAMBIOS MONGODB // DESEABLES // PLATILLA POR USUARIO // PLANTILLA POR AÑO // PLANTILLA EN LA QUE SE PUEDAN AGREGAR MAS FILAS PARA CALCULOS DETALLADOS const arrayBudget = { budget: [1000, 800], jan: [1000, 800], feb: [1000, 800], mar: [1000, 800], apr: [1000, 800], may: [1000, 800], jun: [1000, 1000], jul: [1000, 800], ago: [1000, 800], sep: [1000, 800], oct: [1000, 800], nov: [1000, 800], dec: [2000, 800] }; function Averageincome() { let x = 0; let y = 0; x = ((arrayBudget.jan[0] + arrayBudget.feb[0] + arrayBudget.mar[0] + arrayBudget.apr[0] + arrayBudget.may[0] + arrayBudget.jun[0] + arrayBudget.jul[0] + arrayBudget.ago[0] + arrayBudget.sep[0] + arrayBudget.oct[0] + arrayBudget.nov[0] + arrayBudget.dec[0] ) / 12); y = x.toFixed(2); return y ; } function Averageexpense() { let x = 0; let y = 0; x = ((arrayBudget.jan[1] + arrayBudget.feb[1] + arrayBudget.mar[1] + arrayBudget.apr[1] + arrayBudget.may[1] + arrayBudget.jun[1] + arrayBudget.jul[1] + arrayBudget.ago[1] + arrayBudget.sep[1] + arrayBudget.oct[1] + arrayBudget.nov[1] + arrayBudget.dec[1] ) / 12); y = x.toFixed(2); return y ; } class App extends Component { render() { return (

PERSONAL FINANCE

BUDGET JAN FEB MAR APR MAY JUN JUL AGO SEP OCT NOV DEC AVERAGE TOTAL
INCOME {arrayBudget.budget[0]} {arrayBudget.jan[0]} {arrayBudget.feb[0]} {arrayBudget.mar[0]} {arrayBudget.apr[0]} {arrayBudget.may[0]} {arrayBudget.jun[0]} {arrayBudget.jul[0]} {arrayBudget.ago[0]} {arrayBudget.sep[0]} {arrayBudget.oct[0]} {arrayBudget.nov[0]} {arrayBudget.dec[0]}
EXPENCE {arrayBudget.budget[1]} {arrayBudget.jan[1]} {arrayBudget.feb[1]} {arrayBudget.mar[1]} {arrayBudget.apr[1]} {arrayBudget.may[1]} {arrayBudget.jun[1]} {arrayBudget.jul[1]} {arrayBudget.ago[1]} {arrayBudget.sep[1]} {arrayBudget.oct[1]} {arrayBudget.nov[1]} {arrayBudget.dec[1]} 800
SAVINGS 200 {arrayBudget.jan[0]-arrayBudget.jan[1]} {arrayBudget.feb[0]-arrayBudget.feb[1]} {arrayBudget.mar[0]-arrayBudget.mar[1]} {arrayBudget.abr[0]-arrayBudget.abr[1]} {arrayBudget.may[0]-arrayBudget.may[1]} {arrayBudget.jun[0]-arrayBudget.jun[1]} {arrayBudget.jul[0]-arrayBudget.jul[1]} {arrayBudget.ago[0]-arrayBudget.ago[1]} {arrayBudget.sep[0]-arrayBudget.sep[1]} {arrayBudget.oct[0]-arrayBudget.oct[1]} {arrayBudget.nov[0]-arrayBudget.nov[1]} {arrayBudget.dec[0]-arrayBudget.dec[1]} 200 200

2018

); } } export default App;
